C:\Windows\system32\wsl.exe --distribution Ubuntu-20.04 --exec /bin/bash -c "export CMAKE_COLOR_DIAGNOSTICS=ON && export CLION_IDE=TRUE && export JETBRAINS_IDE=TRUE && cd '/mnt/g/My Drive/University/Year 2/Semester 2/COS 214/Practicals/Practical 3/Section A IDE/cmake-build-wsl_profile' && /usr/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -G 'CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles' '/mnt/g/My Drive/University/Year 2/Semester 2/COS 214/Practicals/Practical 3/Section A IDE'"
/bin/bash: /usr/bin/cmake: No such file or directory
